issue.title: [Plasma] Plasma client should be thread-safe
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5533](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5533). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
<https://github.com/ray-project/ray/pull/4922#discussion_r291422782>

Make plasma client thread safe, so it's guaranteed when the PlasmaBuffer for an object destructs, the call to plasma_client.Release(object_id) is properly protected.
